TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit GuidConverter extends System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter

summary.span: 提供将 对象与其他各种表示形式相互转换的类型转换器。

span.span: Provides a type converter to convert objects to and from various other representations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此转换器只能在 GUID 对象与字符串之间实现转换。This converter can only convert a GUID object to and from a string. 有关类型转换器的详细信息，请参阅基类和[如何： 实现类型转换器](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/90373a3f-d8c8-492d-841c-945d62393c56)。For more information about type converters, see the base class and [How to: Implement a Type Converter](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/90373a3f-d8c8-492d-841c-945d62393c56). > [!CAUTION] > 决不要创建的实例。You should never create an instance of a . 而应调用 类的 方法。Instead, call the method of the class. 有关详细信息，请参阅中的示例基类。For more information, see the examples in the base class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将转换类型的变量的为一个字符串，反之亦然。The following code example converts a variable of type to a string, and vice versa. [!code-cpp[Converters#13](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Converters/CPP/converters.cpp#13)] [!code-csharp[Converters#13](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Converters/CS/converters.cs#13)] [!code-vb[Converters#13](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Converters/VB/converters.vb#13)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此转换器只能在 GUID 对象与字符串之间实现转换。This converter can only convert a GUID object to and from a string. `context` 参数可用于提取有关从中调用该转换器的环境的附加信息。The `context` parameter can be used to extract additional information about the environment this converter is being invoked from. 此参数可能为 `null`，因此总是需要检查。This can be `null`, so always check. 同样，上下文对象的属性可以返回 `null`。Also, properties on the context object can return `null`.

summary.span: 将给定对象转换为其他类型。

span.span: Converts the given object to another type.
The converted object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 最常见的转换类型是与字符串对象的相互转换。The most common types to convert are to and from a string object. 默认实现将调用对象上的对象是否有效且目标类型为`string`。The default implementation will make a call to on the object if the object is valid and if the destination type is `string`. `context` 参数可用于提取有关从中调用该转换器的环境的附加信息。The `context` parameter can be used to extract additional information about the environment this converter is being invoked from. 此参数可能为 `null`，因此总是需要检查。This can be `null`, so always check. 同样，上下文对象的属性可以返回 `null`。Also, properties on the context object can return `null`.

span.span: is .
The conversion cannot be performed.
